price: (Nkͻmhyεni), ka sε: ‘’Menkorͻfoͻ, modeε monyε moadwuma sεdeε moamamerε kyerε, menso mereyε dwuma (sεdeε Nyankopͻn ahyε me), na mobehunu yεn mu nea ͻbenya awieε pa wͻ Daakye. Nokorε sε, abͻneεfoͻ no deε wͻ’nni nkonim.
arabic: قُلۡ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡمَلُواْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمۡ إِنِّي عَامِلٞۖ فَسَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ مَن تَكُونُ لَهُۥ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلدَّارِۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفۡلِحُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul yāqawmi iʿ'malū ʿalā makānatikum innī ʿāmilun fasawfa taʿlamūna man takūnu lahu ʿāqibatu al-dāri innahu lā yuf'liḥu al-ẓālimūna
